h3cDot11RRM.name: h3cDot11RRM

revisions.description: Modified to add new nodes and new table.
Modified to add new nodes and new table.
Modified to add new table and new group.
The initial revision of this MIB module.

h3cDot11RRM.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R.China Http://www.h3c.com Zip: 100085
h3cDot11RRM.description: This MIB file is to provide the object definition of WLAN radio resource management (RRM).

h3cDot11RRM11nMadtMaxMcs.name: h3cDot11RRM11nMadtMaxMcs
h3cDot11RRM11nMadtMaxMcs.description: Specify the maximum modulation and coding scheme (MCS) index for 802.11n mandatory rates. The value 255 indicates that no maximum MCS index is specified. No maximum MCS index is specified for 802.11n mandatory rates by default. Besides 255, the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n supported rates must be no less than the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n mandatory rates.

h3cDot11RRM11nSuptMaxMcs.name: h3cDot11RRM11nSuptMaxMcs
h3cDot11RRM11nSuptMaxMcs.description: Specify the maximum Modulation and Coding Scheme (MCS) index for 802.11n supported rates. The specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n supported rates must be no less than the specified maximum MCS index for 802.11n mandatory rates.

h3cDot11RRM11aPwrConstrt.name: h3cDot11RRM11aPwrConstrt
h3cDot11RRM11aPwrConstrt.description: Configure the power constraint for all 802.11a radios. The configured power constraint is advertised in beacons if spectrum management is enabled. The range of power constraint is 0 to MAX-POWER-1 (where the MAX-POWER is defined by the regulatory domain).

h3cDot11RRM11aSpectrumManag.name: h3cDot11RRM11aSpectrumManag
h3cDot11RRM11aSpectrumManag.description: Enable/Disable spectrum management for 802.11a radios. When spectrum management is enabled, the WLAN sub-system advertises power capabilities of the AP and power constraints applicable to all devices in the BSS based on regulatory domain specification.

h3cDot11RRMAutoChlAvoid11h.name: h3cDot11RRMAutoChlAvoid11h
h3cDot11RRMAutoChlAvoid11h.description: Configure the auto-channel set as non-dot11h channels, this is, only the non-dot11h channels belonging to the country code are scanned during initial channel selection and one of them is selected.

h3cDot11RRMScanChl.name: h3cDot11RRMScanChl
h3cDot11RRMScanChl.description: Set the scan mode. auto: When this option is set, all channels of the country code being set are scanned. all: When this option is set, all the channels of the radio band are scanned.

h3cDot11APInterfNumThreshhd.name: h3cDot11APInterfNumThreshhd
h3cDot11APInterfNumThreshhd.description: Represents threshold of AP interference . If the value of AP interference exceeds this threshold, AP interference trap will be sent. If the value of this node is zero, AP interference trap will be sent immediately.

h3cDot11StaInterfNumThreshhd.name: h3cDot11StaInterfNumThreshhd
h3cDot11StaInterfNumThreshhd.description: Represents threshold of STA interference. If the value of STA interference exceeds this threshold, STA interference trap will be sent. If the value of this node is zero, STA interference trap will be sent immediately.

h3cDot11RRMRadioCfgTable.name: h3cDot11RRMRadioCfgTable
h3cDot11RRMRadioCfgTable.description: Configure WLAN RRM based radio type. When 802.11b parameter is modified, 802.11g parameter will be changed at the same time. In the same way, when 802.11g parameter is modified, 802.11b parameter will be changed at the same time.

h3cDot11RRMRadioCfgEntry.name: h3cDot11RRMRadioCfgEntry
h3cDot11RRMRadioCfgEntry.description: Configure WLAN RRM based radio type. When 802.11b parameter is modified, 802.11g parameter will be changed at the same time. In the same way, when 802.11g parameter is modified, 802.11b parameter will be changed at the same time.

h3cDot11RRMCfgChlMode.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgChlMode
h3cDot11RRMCfgChlMode.description: Configure the mode of channel selection. This node can be configured only when dynamic channel selection is enabled.

h3cDot11RRMChlProntoRadioElmt.name: h3cDot11RRMChlProntoRadioElmt
h3cDot11RRMChlProntoRadioElmt.description: Specify the AP and radio that will change channel at next calibration cycle. 0 is returned when getting the value of this node. This node can be configured only when the mode of channel selection control is user-triggered. When configuring, the higher 24 bits stand for the AP index, and the last 8 bits stand for the radio index. 4294967295 stand for configuring each radio on all APs.

h3cDot11RRMCfgPwrState.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgPwrState
h3cDot11RRMCfgPwrState.description: Enable/Disable dynamic power selection for the band.

h3cDot11RRMCfgPwrMode.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgPwrMode
h3cDot11RRMCfgPwrMode.description: Configure the mode of transmit power control. This node can be configured only when dynamic power selection is enabled.

h3cDot11RRMPwrProntoRadioElmt.name: h3cDot11RRMPwrProntoRadioElmt
h3cDot11RRMPwrProntoRadioElmt.description: Specify the AP and radio that will change power at next calibration cycle. 0 is returned when getting the value of this node. This node can be configured only when the mode of transmit power control is user-triggered. When configuring, the higher 24 bits stand for the AP index, and the last 8 bits stand for the radio index. 4294967295 stand for configuring each radio on all APs.

h3cDot11RRMCfgIntrfThres.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgIntrfThres
h3cDot11RRMCfgIntrfThres.description: Configure the interface threshold. By default, interference observed on an operating channel is considered during dynamic frequency selection and transmit power control. If the interference percentage on the channel reaches the set threshold, RRM will perform resource adjustment to control the situation.

h3cDot11RRMCfgPERThres.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgPERThres
h3cDot11RRMCfgPERThres.description: Configure the CRC error threshold. If the percentage of CRC errors reaches the threshold, RRM will perform resource adjustment to control the situation.

h3cDot11RRMCfgToleranceFctr.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgToleranceFctr
h3cDot11RRMCfgToleranceFctr.description: Configure the tolerance level. During dynamic frequency selection (DFS), the channel will be changed only if there is a better channel having lesser interference and packet error rate than those specified by the user.

h3cDot11RRMCfgAdjacencyFctr.name: h3cDot11RRMCfgAdjacencyFctr
h3cDot11RRMCfgAdjacencyFctr.description: Configure the adjacency factor for the band. If transmit power control (TPC) is configured, power will be adjusted when the nth neighbor is detected. The value n is the adjacency factor.

h3cDot11RRMAPCfgTable.name: h3cDot11RRMAPCfgTable
h3cDot11RRMAPCfgTable.description: This table defines the RRM parameters for AP.

h3cDot11RRMAPCfgEntry.name: h3cDot11RRMAPCfgEntry
h3cDot11RRMAPCfgEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM parameters for AP.

h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupTable.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupTable
h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupTable.description: This table defines RRM self-decisive radio group.

h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupEntry.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupEntry
h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupEntry.description: Each entry contains information of one RRM self-decisive radio group.

h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupId.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupId
h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupId.description: Represents RRM self-decisive radio group ID.

h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupDesc.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupDesc
h3cDot11RRMSDRadioGroupDesc.description: Represents the description of RRM self-decisive radio group.

h3cDot11RRMSDRdGrpChlHolddownTm.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRdGrpChlHolddownTm
h3cDot11RRMSDRdGrpChlHolddownTm.description: Represents the channel holddown time of RRM self-decisive radio group.

h3cDot11RRMSDRdGrpPwrHolddownTm.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRdGrpPwrHolddownTm
h3cDot11RRMSDRdGrpPwrHolddownTm.description: Represents the power holddown time of RRM self-decisive radio group.

h3cDot11RRMSDRdGroupRowStatus.name: h3cDot11RRMSDRdGroupRowStatus
h3cDot11RRMSDRdGroupRowStatus.description: The row status of this table entry.

h3cDot11RRMAPCfg2Table.name: h3cDot11RRMAPCfg2Table
h3cDot11RRMAPCfg2Table.description: This table defines the RRM parameters for AP.

h3cDot11RRMAPCfg2Entry.name: h3cDot11RRMAPCfg2Entry
h3cDot11RRMAPCfg2Entry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM parameters for AP.

h3cDot11RRMAPIntfThreshold.name: h3cDot11RRMAPIntfThreshold
h3cDot11RRMAPIntfThreshold.description: Represents threshold of AP interference . If the number of AP interference exceeds this threshold, AP interference trap will be sent.

h3cDot11RRMStaIntfThreshold.name: h3cDot11RRMStaIntfThreshold
h3cDot11RRMStaIntfThreshold.description: Represents threshold of STA interference. If the number of STA interference exceeds this threshold, station interference trap will be sent.

h3cDot11RRMCoChlIntfTrapThhd.name: h3cDot11RRMCoChlIntfTrapThhd
h3cDot11RRMCoChlIntfTrapThhd.description: Represents threshold of interference trap with current ap. If signal strength of the device exceeds this threshold, corresponding trap will be sent.

h3cDot11RRMAdjChlIntfTrapThhd.name: h3cDot11RRMAdjChlIntfTrapThhd
h3cDot11RRMAdjChlIntfTrapThhd.description: Represents threshold of adjacent interference trap with current ap. If signal strength of the device exceeds this threshold, corresponding trap will be sent.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptTable.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptTable
h3cDot11RRMChlRptTable.description: This table shows the RRM channel information of each radio on all APs.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptEntry.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptEntry
h3cDot11RRMChlRptEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM channel information of the radio on the AP.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptNbrCnt.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptNbrCnt
h3cDot11RRMChlRptNbrCnt.description: Number of neighbors found on the channel.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptLoad.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptLoad
h3cDot11RRMChlRptLoad.description: Load observed on the channel in percentage.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptUtlz.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptUtlz
h3cDot11RRMChlRptUtlz.description: Utilization of the channel in percentage.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptIntrf.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptIntrf
h3cDot11RRMChlRptIntrf.description: Interference observed on the channel in percentage.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptPER.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptPER
h3cDot11RRMChlRptPER.description: Packet error rate observed on the channel in percentage.

h3cDot11RRMChlRptRetryRate.name: h3cDot11RRMChlRptRetryRate
h3cDot11RRMChlRptRetryRate.description: Percentage of retransmission happened on the channel.

h3cDot11RRMNbrInfoTable.name: h3cDot11RRMNbrInfoTable
h3cDot11RRMNbrInfoTable.description: This table shows the RRM neighbor information of each radio on all APs.

h3cDot11RRMNbrInfoEntry.name: h3cDot11RRMNbrInfoEntry
h3cDot11RRMNbrInfoEntry.description: Each entry contains information of RRM neighbor information of the radio on an AP.

h3cDot11RrmNbrChl.name: h3cDot11RrmNbrChl
h3cDot11RrmNbrChl.description: Channel number on which the neighbor was found.

h3cDot11RRMNbrIntrf.name: h3cDot11RRMNbrIntrf
h3cDot11RRMNbrIntrf.description: Interference observed on the channel in percentage by neighbor.

h3cDot11RrmNbrRSSI.name: h3cDot11RrmNbrRSSI
h3cDot11RrmNbrRSSI.description: Signal strength of the AP in dBm.

h3cDot11RrmNbrType.name: h3cDot11RrmNbrType
h3cDot11RrmNbrType.description: Type of the AP, managed or unmanaged.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryTable.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryTable
h3cDot11RRMHistoryTable.description: This table shows the details of the latest three channel changes and power changes applied on all APs, including time of change, reason of the change and the channel, power, interference parameters.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryEntry.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryEntry
h3cDot11RRMHistoryEntry.description: Each entry shows the details of channel and power changes.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryRecIndctr.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryRecIndctr
h3cDot11RRMHistoryRecIndctr.description: History record type of the change.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryChl.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryChl
h3cDot11RRMHistoryChl.description: Channel on which the radio operates before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryPwr.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryPwr
h3cDot11RRMHistoryPwr.description: Power of the radio before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryLoad.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryLoad
h3cDot11RRMHistoryLoad.description: Load observed on the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryUtlz.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryUtlz
h3cDot11RRMHistoryUtlz.description: Utilization of the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryIntrf.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryIntrf
h3cDot11RRMHistoryIntrf.description: Interference observed on the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryNoise.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryNoise
h3cDot11RRMHistoryNoise.description: Noise observed on the radio before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryPER.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryPER
h3cDot11RRMHistoryPER.description: Packet error rate observed on the radio in percentage before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryRetryRate.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryRetryRate
h3cDot11RRMHistoryRetryRate.description: Percentage of retransmission happened on the radio before/after the change of channel or power.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryChgReason.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryChgReason
h3cDot11RRMHistoryChgReason.description: Reason for the change of channel or power. The various bit positions are: |0 |Others | |1 |Coverage | |2 |Radar | |3 |Retransmission | |4 |Packets discarded | |5 |Interference | 0 is returned when the history record type is after.

h3cDot11RRMHistoryChgDateTime.name: h3cDot11RRMHistoryChgDateTime
h3cDot11RRMHistoryChgDateTime.description: The time when the channel or power change occurred.

h3cDot11RRMIntrfLimit.name: h3cDot11RRMIntrfLimit
h3cDot11RRMIntrfLimit.description: This notification will be sent when interference on the radio exceeds the limit.

h3cDot11RRMPERLimit.name: h3cDot11RRMPERLimit
h3cDot11RRMPERLimit.description: This notification will be sent when packet error rate on the radio exceeds the limit.

h3cDot11RRMNoiseLimit.name: h3cDot11RRMNoiseLimit
h3cDot11RRMNoiseLimit.description: This notification will be sent when noise on the radio exceeds the limit.

h3cDot11RRMPowerChange.name: h3cDot11RRMPowerChange
h3cDot11RRMPowerChange.description: This notification will be sent when power changed on the radio automatically.

h3cDot11NewPower.name: h3cDot11NewPower
h3cDot11NewPower.description: Power of the radio after the change of power.

h3cDot11OldPower.name: h3cDot11OldPower
h3cDot11OldPower.description: Power of the radio before the change of power.

h3cDot11MonitorDetectedDevTable.name: h3cDot11MonitorDetectedDevTable
h3cDot11MonitorDetectedDevTable.description: This table shows the devices of AP detected

h3cDot11MonitorDetectedDevEntry.name: h3cDot11MonitorDetectedDevEntry
h3cDot11MonitorDetectedDevEntry.description: Each entry contains information of detected devices.

h3cDot11MonitorDevMAC.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevMAC
h3cDot11MonitorDevMAC.description: Represents MAC address of the device detected.

h3cDot11MonitorDevType.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevType
h3cDot11MonitorDevType.description: Represents type of the device detected.

h3cDot11MonitorDevVendor.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevVendor
h3cDot11MonitorDevVendor.description: Represents vendor of the detected device.

h3cDot11MonitorDevSSID.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevSSID
h3cDot11MonitorDevSSID.description: Represents the service set identifier for the ESS of the device which type is ap or adhoc.

h3cDot11MonitorDevBSSID.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevBSSID
h3cDot11MonitorDevBSSID.description: Represents the basic service set identifier of the detected device.

h3cDot11MonitorDevChannel.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevChannel
h3cDot11MonitorDevChannel.description: Represents the channel in which the device was last detected. AP will choose the channel which has maximum signal strength as effective channel, as there is interference between adjacent channels.

h3cDot11MonitorRadioId.name: h3cDot11MonitorRadioId
h3cDot11MonitorRadioId.description: Represents the radio ID of the AP that detected the device.

h3cDot11MonitorDevMaxRSSI.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevMaxRSSI
h3cDot11MonitorDevMaxRSSI.description: Represents the maximum detected RSSI of the device in a scan report cycle.

h3cDot11MonitorDevBeaconIntvl.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevBeaconIntvl
h3cDot11MonitorDevBeaconIntvl.description: Represents the beacon interval for the detected device(not include the device which type is client).

h3cDot11MonitorDevFstDctTime.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevFstDctTime
h3cDot11MonitorDevFstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the device was first detected.

h3cDot11MonitorDevLstDctTime.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevLstDctTime
h3cDot11MonitorDevLstDctTime.description: Represents the time at which the device was detected last time.

h3cDot11MonitorDevClear.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevClear
h3cDot11MonitorDevClear.description: This object is used to clear the information of the device detected in the WLAN. It will return false for get operation.

h3cDot11MonitorDevSNR.name: h3cDot11MonitorDevSNR
h3cDot11MonitorDevSNR.description: Represents the SNR of the device in a scan report cycle.
